name: Tonkatsu Wako
description: Go here if you want to get stuffed, 'cuz they have all-you-can-eat shredded cabbage, miso soup, and rice.

name: Pizzeria Peppe
description: Music is a little loud but it's the best Italian here so far.

name: Wolfgang Puck
description: A decent Italian place. A little pricey.

name: Taco Rico
description: One word. Burrito!

name: Maguro Dake
description: Best tuna bowl in the area! They only have tuna in the menu.

name: French up the hill
description: Go here if you like butter, like lots of it! Super tender pork! Lamb chops! Oven-baked chicken!

name: Balcony
description: Cost-performance French place. Probably the best French here. Everything here is delicious, down to the coffee and baguette.

name: Green Brothers
description: Salad place located at the building next to us. You have more dressing options here.

name: Salad Stop
description: The closest salad place. Just located at the 2nd floor of this building.

name: Nirvanam
description: Best Indian in the area. 50% chance of free drinks.

name: Indian buffet at Izumi Tower
description: They sometimes have all-you-can-eat butter chicken curry and tandoori chicken.

name: 七草
description: Shabu-shabu place!

name: Trattoria
description: Italian place located at Izumi Tower next to the Shabu place.

name: Jasmine Thai
description: Best Thai food in the area. Expect to walk 15 minutes each way though.

name: Dippalace
description: Located at The Box. Need to go to the other side of Roppongi-itchome station.

name: Bistro French Restaurant
description: Delicious steak and yummy moist bread.

name: Shake Shack
description: American burgers and stuff. Roppongi station.

name: Frijoles
description: Burrito! Need I say more? It's at Roppongi station.

name: Bubby's
description: Pie place at Ark Mori Hills.

name: Ikinari Steak
description: Cost-performance steak. Located in front Kamiyacho exit.

name: The far-away Sushi place
description: The expensive sushi place.

name: Food truck
description: Not bad! Some are actually delicious.

name: Korean Bibimbap Place
description: Delicious bibimbap. You're going to have to cross Roppongi-itchome station though.

name: Cinnabon
description: A heavenly heart-attack. Pecanbon is the bomb.
